summary: The housekeeper to a retired actress tries at the same time to look after her own two emotionally disturbed sisters, with dramatic results.
cast: Ida Lupino|Louis Hayward|Evelyn Keyes|Elsa Lanchester|Edith Barrett|Isobel Elsom|Emma Dunn|Queenie Leonard|Clyde Cook
title: El misterio de Fiske Manor
